properties.description: Assessment of the results achieved under the Chronic Care Passport Program in the Caribbean to determine if this is an effective approach to address NCDs with a results focus.

Technical Assistance to promote benefits and good practices of Health and Family Life Education (HFLE) in the Caribbean using a promotional video and update of HFLE teacher curriculum and providing standards of good practice on school health and nutrition (including HIV/AIDS) using enchmarking system

Technical Assistance on the Nurse Labor and Education Markets in the English-speaking Caribbean in support of policy dialogue towards a regional agreement focusing on the need to strengthen the monitoring of the nurse workforce at a regional level.  (link: http://web.worldbank.org/WBSITE/EXTERNAL/COUNTRIES/LACEXT/JAMAICAEXTN/0,,contentMDK:22493381~pagePK:1497618~piPK:217854~theSitePK:338335,00.html)

properties.activity name: Dominica and St. Lucia - Health Results-Based Financing
properties.description: Knowledge services to support Dominica and St. Lucia gain a better understanding of Results-Based Financing Approaches and explore its feasibility in their country context
